name: wednesday
title: Wednesday
subtitle: A Murder of Woes
description: Wednesday lands in trouble with Principal Weems, but that's just the start of her problems. To fight an ancient evil, she'll need all her friends' help.
cast: Jenna Ortega, Gwendoline Christie, Riki Lindhome and more
genres: TV Mysteries, Crime TV Shows, Fantasy TV Shows

moreInfo.facts: Not only did Jenna Ortega learn to play the cello, she took fencing, archery, canoeing, German, and boxing lessons to prep for her role.
Hunter Doohan had to take a driving test for one scene.
The actor who played Xavier Thorpe's most memorable gag? He stole a golf cart from set. He and Georgie Farmer (Ajax) got in trouble after being chased down the street by crew members.
To understand her character Enid Sinclair better, the actress attended a werewolf bootcamp
Joy Sunday was freaked out by her bright contact lenses at first.

Petrification (“stoning”): Ajax is a gorgon, meaning he has the power to turn an onlooker into stone. He hides his hair (made of snakes) under a beanie for safety, so he does not use his power accidentally.
Christina Ricci had previously starred as Wednesday Addams in the Addams Family (1991) and the Addams Family 2 (1993).
In the German version, Thing is called eiskaltes Händchen (means ice cold little hand).
Miss Weems was the name of the family babysitter in the Charles Addams comics.
Catherine Zeta-Jones spent the longest time in hair and makeup- the transformation took about two and a half hours.
He is almost always seen in sheriff attire.
She is of Irish and primarily of Swedish descent.

name: spider-man
title: Spider-man
subtitle: Best spidey ever
description: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.
cast: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco

moreInfo.facts: Tobey Maguire said he had never read a Spider-Man comic book but took the role because he liked the script.

Kirsten Dunst decided to audition for MJ after learning that Tobey Maguire had been cast, feeling the film would have a more independent feel. She earned the role a month before shooting in an audition in Berlin.

The Green Goblin's costume was originally designed to be more bulky and armoured, but Willem Dafoe, having decided to film his own stunts, rejected it in favour of a more streamlined and athletic costume. The final outfit was composed of 580 pieces and took Dafoe half an hour to put on.

When James Franco joked about Tobey Maguire's 'frog-like' features on set, the latter was reportedly genuinely upset by Franco's comments. This created friction between the two actors, which led to the existing rivalry between them now - a rivalry that was admitted to by Maguire in interviews since the Spider-Man franchise.
Although Uncle Ben claims to be 68 in the film, Cliff Robertson was 75 at the time of filming. Make-up artists still made him look a little older.
The Thanksgiving scene when Aunt May puts the turkey in front of Norman imitates the Norman Rockwell painting- Freedom From Want

J. Jonah Jameson has a telescope in his office. While preparing for the role, J K Simmons visited the offices of the New York Post and saw that the editor had a telescope in his own office. So, he incorporated it into Jameson's character.
Joe Manganiello revealed that he was offered $100 by two crew members to actually punch Tobey Maguire in the face during their fight scene.
